Tools description.message: Webmaker 工具 把網路上的創作方式變簡單了。打造你自己的網頁、互動影片、混搭作品、行動應用程式與更多其他東西，並在實作中學習 Web 原理與操作、程式編寫及其他重要技能。
Tools description.description: a description of the webmaker tools

Contribute a guide or resource.message: 貢獻教學指南或其他資源

Sign up for Webmaker announcement list.message: Sign up for the Webmaker announcement list.

Web Literacy Map.description: The title of the explore section

Resources for teaching the web.message: 傳授 Web 技能的資源
Resources for teaching the web.description: Heading for the second explore subsection with document stacks

Suggest your own links and resources.message: 這個頁面已經進化了！將您的連結及資源加入建議清單內。 或者更深入參與。

Visit our communications wiki.message: Visit our communications wiki to find even more places you can reach us.

success resource banner.message: 感謝您！ 我們已經收到您的資源建議。

Jump right in.description: headline for third section on home page

Explore Webmaker.description: headline on first topic of 'jump right in' on home page

More Resources.description: See more kits in a search

Start Teaching.description: Teach site referral button text on Home page

Connect through social media.message: Connect through social media and see what people are making, follow events from around the world and check out new Webmaker projects by visiting our Tumblr, Twitter, Facebook, Flickr, YouTube and our blog.

Teaching kits.description: First square in contribute grid on explore

Teaching kits desc.message: 創造或分享數位技能的教材資源。
Teaching kits desc.description: Copy for first square in contribute grid on explore

Receive occasional email updates.message: 接收電子郵件新訊通知，僅含最重要的訊息，大約每月一次。

Help with beta-testing & quality assuran.message: 協助 Beta 版測試 & 品管檢測

Build the web with others.message: Build the web with others at a local event, or find the resources to host your own.
Build the web with others.description: copy for third topic of 'jump right in' on home page

Making is the basis of everything we do..message: Making is the basis of everything we do. Try remixing one of our starter resources, or make something from scratch using X-Ray Goggles, Thimble, or Popcorn Maker. Then share it with the world using hashtag #webmaker.

Learn to build it with Mozilla..message: 跟 Mozillla 一起學習如何塑造它

Receiving your opinions on the Webmaker.message: 能得到您使用 Webmaker 的經驗與意見對我們很重要。實際上，您的回饋將會是我們在規劃未來改善計畫時首先要考慮的。請花一點時間告訴我們，您喜歡這個站的哪些地方，又有哪些地方是您覺得不對的，或是可以更好的。

Mozilla is a nonprofit organization.message: Mozilla is a non-profit organization and these open-source tools are created by a global community. They will always be 100% free—now and forever!
Mozilla is a nonprofit organization.description: Value description for free on home page

Privacy matters.description: Text on back side of privacy day eyeball on home

Mozilla’s free tools.message: Mozilla’s free tools help you build the web while learning new skills.

We believe that digital literacy is more.message: We believe that digital literacy is more than just learning to code. Our tools, learning resources and community networks empower everyone to become citizens of the web.
We believe that digital literacy is more.description: Value description for more than code on home page

Learn to Teach.description: headline on second topic of 'jump right in' on home page

What language is your resource link?.message: 這份資源連結是什麼語言？

Partner desc.message: 跟 Mozilla 一起幫助傳授 Web 技能。
Partner desc.description: Copy for sixth square in contribute grid on explore

Resources section description.message: Webmaker 的資源區是您的 Web 素養指南。發掘如寫程式、講故事、保護自身線上隱私及其他的新能力！每一區都有方便深入探索的鏈結、有實作專題可以動手，還有更多教學活動。
Resources section description.description: Copy for the second explore subsection with document stacks

Translate.description: Third square in contribute grid on explore

Get involved with webmaker.message: Webmaker 是 Mozilla 非營利任務 之一，目的在創造一個更開放、更具 Web 素養的網路世界。
Get involved with webmaker.description: Copy for first explore subsection with map

Skills.description: Title for list of web literacy skills

Design.description: Fourth square in contribute grid on explore

Start Creating.description: button text on footer on home

As a non-profit organization, we depend.message: 作為非營利組織，我們需要您解囊相助，支持我們的目標 -- 鼓勵全球上千萬民眾從「逛網站」進而「做網站」。

All Webmaker tools are open source..message: 所有 Webmaker 工具都是開放原始碼。貢獻您的想法、程式補綴或回報程式錯誤，也可以提供自己的測試演示或原型。請參考文件、問題追蹤系統與其他資訊。

Want to teach the web to others?.message: Want to teach the web to others?
Want to teach the web to others?.description: Teach site referral heading on Home page

Study at your own pace.message: Study at your own pace to teach web literacy, digital skills, and open practices.
Study at your own pace.description: copy for second topic of 'jump right in' on home page

View events.description: link copy on home 'jump right in' section

Become a mentor.description: Button in mentors section on literacy pages, line item on /getinvolved

When you file your bug, be sure to use f.message: 當您回報程式錯誤時，記得在 Status Whiteboard 欄位加註 "Feedback" 字樣，我們比較容易搜尋。
When you file your bug, be sure to use f.description: explainer text for status whiteboard on Feedback

Footer header.description: Header for bottom section of explore

Our team uses an issue tracker called Bu.message: 我們團隊使用 Bugzilla 做問題的回報與追蹤系統。所有人都可以來提交所發現的問題。雖然說是「問題」，但不一定非得是發生錯誤才能回報；如果您有功能上的需求或想法，或是一些非關技術的喜好與改善建議也可以提出。

noStaffPick.message: 目前還沒有精選教學資源，提供一份吧。
noStaffPick.description: No item in the list picked by staff and there is a submit link.

Partner.description: Sixth square in contribute grid on explore

Mozilla Webmaker creates software, proje.message: Mozilla Webmaker 透過製作與分享軟體、專案與活動來推廣網路素養。我們是一個經由自造者、指導者與社群領導者自主驅動的開放源碼專案。我們希望您可以參與。
Mozilla Webmaker creates software, proje.description: copy for ‘9 ways to get involved’

Join our community call.message: 歡迎參加每星期二的社群會議，問問題，與社群及我們的成員聊聊，或尋找您所需的資源。

Code desc.message: 來幫我們 MakeAPI 抓錯、送交補綴、加強改造！

make-learn-teach-section-info.message: Webmaker 社群會在全世界各地舉辦活動 — 圖書館、社區活動中心、網咖、或甚至您的客廳中。在這裡尋找在您附近的活動，學著怎麼舉辦活動，或是參與我們全球的 Maker Party（2014 年七到九月）。

connect in many ways..message: 我們是龐大的社群，以各種不同的方式彼此連結。

Participate in user testing.message: 參與使用性測試、給予建議回饋、或幫忙維護品質。有您協助測試、提供想法，將讓 Mozilla Webmaker 的產品變得更好、塑造更好的未來。

Status Whiteboard:.description: label for faux bugzilla field on Feedback

new Webmaker tools and projects.message: 現在就來試試新的Webmaker工具及項目。

Login to submit a resource.description: A button Login to submit a resource.

Contribute subsection copy.message: Webmaker 是基於 Mozilla 的非營利宣言，為了打造、保護開放網路而成立的專案。Webmaker 開放原始碼、由社群鼎力支持，希望您可以一起加入。
Contribute subsection copy.description: Copy for the contribute subsection of explore

Investigate the tools, learning resource.message: Investigate the tools, learning resources and community that Webmaker offers.
Investigate the tools, learning resource.description: copy for first topic of 'jump right in' on home page

Webmaker helps people across the world.message: Webmaker helps people across the world become informed creators of a free and open web.

Free tools that make it easy to create a.message: 讓創作與學習都更加容易的免費工具
Free tools that make it easy to create a.description: Header for section that includes description of webmaker tools

or remix someone elses.description: headline for gallery section of Make Your Own

You don’t need to be a wizard to teach t.message: You don’t need to be a wizard to teach the web. We’ve created hackable guides for teaching web literacy, webmaking, online storytelling and more. Want to create your own lesson plan? We have great templates for that.

Join Mozillas community of educators.message: Join Mozilla's community of educators who teach digital skills and web literacy.
Join Mozillas community of educators.description: Teach site referral description on Home page

Our values.description: Headline on second section of home

From hack jams to pop ups to the global.message: From hack jams to pop ups to the global Maker Party, there’s an event to suit every interest. Search for one near you or host your own — we have guides to show you how.
From hack jams to pop ups to the global.description: Find or host an event copy

Translate desc.message: 協助我們翻譯並打造更為在地話的 Webmaker。

Events desc.message: 在你的家鄉舉辦 Webmaker 活動。

Mentoring is a chance to share your know.message: 透過輔導他人，您便有機會和全世界、不分年齡的渴求數位技能的學習者分享知識、提供即時回應。

Opportunities to get involved.message: Webmaker 團隊會定期發出通知讓大家來測試我們的站台、工具與訓練資源。要參與我們社群的測試，請參考我們的 wiki 頁面。
Opportunities to get involved.description: copy to encourage people to get involved in testing

Discover creative ways to teach and lear.message: 找出有創意的方式來教導與學習數位超能力
Discover creative ways to teach and lear.description: Heading for first explore subsection with map

Suggest a resource for.message: 建議一份與 {{ skill.term }} 相關的資源

Thimble Desc.message: 打造自己的網頁並發佈。
Thimble Desc.description: Make and publish your own web page.

We all use the web in different ways..message: We all use the web in different ways. Mozilla is dedicated to helping you build a web that’s relevant to your friends, family, business or community—no matter where you live.
We all use the web in different ways..description: Value description for local on home page

We’re always eager to learn how Webmaker.message: 我們希望知道 Webmaker 是怎麼被用於教導各式各樣的人們網路世界的素養。如果您有使用 Webmaker 的案例可以分享，請加入 Webmaker 新聞群組並透過電子郵件分享您的案例與回饋。您也可以在 Twitter 上，透過回覆 @webmaker 或是使用 #teachtheweb 標籤來參與對話。
We’re always eager to learn how Webmaker.description: copy encouraging people to get involved on Feedback

active daily discussion paragraph.message: 這是更為活躍、天天有討論的地方，您可在此協助形塑 Webmaker 專案的未來方向。

Do you have a web literacy project?.message: Do you have a web literacy project? We’d love to hear about it and potentially share it on Webmaker.org.
